about_the_game:
Vol 2 folowing up Krachware Cyberpunk Tileset Pack by Gee Kun Soft. This pack adds more factory, underground, and Sci-Fi elements for building your surroundings. Included are items for Sci-Fi rooms such as chairs and beds along with assets for factory and underground locations like metal stairways, pipes, valves, switches, fans, and more.

The Krachware Cyberpunk Tileset Pack 2 includes a clean futuristic flare along with a more tarnished style that will suite any creator looking for these elements in their next RPG!

Features:

*Tile A2, A4, A5: neon-colored/cyberpunk themed floors and walls. Plus old looking floor and walls for a dystopian vibe. Ground tiles.
*Tile B: Sci-Fi / futuristic living quarters with tables, chairs, beds, computer stations and more. Plus ruins tileset with similar assets that instead have seen more wear and tear.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
